abstract: Barclays Capital announced more hirings on Monday and Tuesday, including the appointment of Citigroup’s Thomas King as its new co-head of corporate finance and Houlihan Lokey’s Tanja Aalto as a managing director in its restructuring group.
snippet: Barclays Capital announced more hirings on Monday and Tuesday, including the appointment of Citigroup’s Thomas King as its new co-head of corporate finance and Houlihan Lokey’s Tanja Aalto as a managing director in its restructuring group.
lead_paragraph: Barclays Capital  on Monday and Tuesday announced more personnel changes, including the appointment of a new co-head of corporate finance to succeed Joseph D. Gatto, whom the bank named as chairman of investment banking.

headline.main: Barclays Capital Makes 2 More Personnel Moves
